main.name: Raymond Gee
main.description: I'm an aspiring Software Engineer honing my skills on the side while working with the largest social media company in the world.
main.bio: I am a Data Quality Analyst that leads teams around the world, reviewing annotated data and validating data quality. I am most comfortable with Java, SQL, and dabbled around with MERN stack. I used to play a lot of League of Legends, and was ranked top 0.002% in North America. Nowadays, I enjoy attempting to replicate tasty food from restaurants to learn, save money, and have fun at the same time.
main.contactmessage: Want to get into contact? Please fill out your name, email, and message. I will get back to you as soon as I can!

resume.skillmessage: Language and Technologies I Am Most Comfortable With

education.description: Notable Courses Taken: Programming Methodology, Analysis of Algorithms, Software Engineering, Internet Application Design & Development, System Administration, and Natural Language Technologies

work.title: Data Quality Analyst
work.description: I work with the largest social media company to ensure quality data for their machine learning algorithm relating to ARVR (Augmented Reality Virtual Reality). I review annotated data to validate data quality, working with and leading multiple teams around the world. I also provide technical support for data management by setting up data uploads with Presto queries and maintain JSON configurations.

work.title: Data Entry Specialist (contract)
work.description: Migrated and managed candidate and job data to new recruiting system (Greenhouse.io). Created and utilized tags to improve candidate and interviewer pairing efficiency.

testimonials.text: Create the perfect timing; it wont create itself.
testimonials.user: All of the motivational speakers mashed into my head
